resources.string: Welcome to the memory enhancer game! Click on GO TO GAME PAGE to start playing. Click on SHOW TILES, after 3 seconds, various colors will fill the file board. You these color arrangements will stay on the board for a short period of time equal to the value of the current interval, which is set in milliseconds (1000 millisecond = 1 second). A number of these tiles will be the target tile color, green. The number of green tiles is equal to the value of the current number of target tiles. Both the interval and number of target tile values can be changed in SETTINGS. The objective is to click on each tile that shows the target tile color. You have an unlimited amount of time to try to remember where all the green tiles are. However, you have a number of guesses equal to the value of the number of target tiles. So if 4 green tiles showed up on the screen, you have 4 clicks to get the correct positions. You can choose the click SHOW ANSWER to see the answer key, however, it will count as you losing the round if you look at the answer before winning the round. You can click STOP before losing the round to stop the game and not store the outcome of this round in the stats.

Welcome to Memory Enhancer! This app can help enhance your memory by playing a game where the objective is to remember the locations of a specific tile color(s) on the tile board. Click on the settings icon in the app menu bar to adjust the difficulty settings.
